Description.Text: Near Pennsylvania Station and within walking distance from the Empire State Building, Madison Square Garden, Times Square, Rockefeller Center and the theatres of Broadway, the GEM Hotel - Midtown West offers comfortable guestrooms furnished with all the latest technologies.

• Jacob Javits Convention Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi • Madame Tussauds Wax Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Madison Square Garden - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • New Amsterdam Theater - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi • Times Square - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi • Macy's - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi • Broadway - 1 km / 0.6 mi • Empire State Building - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 1.6 km / 1 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 1.7 km / 1 mi • Chrysler Building - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi • Central Park - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi • Ellis Island - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi • Statue of Liberty - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi

The GEM Hotel - Midtown West, an Ascend Collection hotel offers 39 guestrooms. Televisions come with cable/satellite channels and pay movies. High-speed Internet access is provided along with phones and in-room safes. Microwaves and coffee/tea makers are provided. Bathrooms include hair dryers. Irons/ironing boards are also included. A nightly turndown service is provided. All guestrooms are non-smoking.

• 24-Hour Front Desk • Non-Smoking Rooms • Rooms/Facilities for Disabled Guests • Elevator • Express Check-In/Check-Out • Safety Deposit Box • Heating • Luggage Storage • Gay Friendly • Allergy-Free Room Available • All Public and Private spaces non-smoking • Airconditioning • Designated Smoking Area • Dry Cleaning • Ironing Service • Shoe Shine • Tour Desk • Fax/Photocopying
The hotel does not have its own restaurant, but there are several dining options within the surrounding Midtown West area.
